sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL, SCORE_LOOKUP_ITEM_SET SLIS WHERE SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID = SLIS.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID AND SLIS.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR# ORDER BY grade

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL, SCORE_LOOKUP_ITEM_SET SLIS WHERE SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID = SLIS.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID AND SLIS.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND
SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL
SL.TEST_FORM like #testForm:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL
#testLevel:VARCHAR# like '%' || SL.TEST_LEVEL || '%'
AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.CONTENT_AREA IS NULL
SL.CONTENT_AREA like '%' || #contentArea:VARCHAR# || '%'
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL
(SL.AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR# OR SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL WHERE SL.FRAMEWORK_CODE = #frameworkCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND
SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL
SL.TEST_FORM = #testForm:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL
SL.TEST_LEVEL = #testLevel:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
(SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR# OR SL.GRADE = '0')
AND
SL.CONTENT_AREA IS NULL
SL.CONTENT_AREA = #contentArea:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL
(SL.AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR# OR SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL)

SELECT FL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, FL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, FL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, FL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, FL.TEST_FORM as testForm, FL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, FL.GRADE as grade, FL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, FL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, FL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, FL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, FL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE, SL.TEST_FORM, SL.TEST_LEVEL, SL.GRADE, SL.CONTENT_AREA, SL.NORM_GROUP, SL.NORM_YEAR, SL.AGE_CATEGORY, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL WHERE SL.FRAMEWORK_CODE = #frameworkCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE >= #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND
SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL
SL.TEST_FORM = #testForm:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL
SL.TEST_LEVEL = #testLevel:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
(SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR# OR SL.GRADE = '0')
AND
SL.CONTENT_AREA IS NULL
SL.CONTENT_AREA = #contentArea:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL
(SL.AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR# OR SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL)
ORDER BY SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE ) FL
WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL WHERE SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND SL.CONTENT_AREA = 'Total Score' AND SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL AND SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.NORM_YEAR IS NULL
SL.NORM_YEAR = #normYear:VARCHAR#

SELECT MAX(SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE) as destScoreValue FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL WHERE SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = 'SCL' AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = 'PL' AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE <= #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND SL.CONTENT_AREA = #contentArea:VARCHAR#
SL.TEST_LEVEL = #testLevel:VARCHAR#

SELECT MIN(SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE) as destScoreValue FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL WHERE SL.FRAMEWORK_CODE = #frameworkCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = 'SCL' AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = 'PL' AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE >= #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND SL.CONTENT_AREA = #contentArea:VARCHAR# AND SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR# AND SL.TEST_FORM = #testForm:VARCHAR#
SL.TEST_LEVEL = #testLevel:VARCHAR#

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID as scoreLookupId, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL, SCORE_LOOKUP_ITEM_SET SLIS WHERE SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID = SLIS.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID AND SLIS.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND
SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL
SL.TEST_FORM like #testForm:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL
#testLevel:VARCHAR# like '%' || SL.TEST_LEVEL || '%'
AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.CONTENT_AREA IS NULL
SL.CONTENT_AREA like '%' || #contentArea:VARCHAR# || '%'
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL
(SL.AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR# OR SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID as scoreLookupId, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL, SCORE_LOOKUP_ITEM_SET SLIS WHERE SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID = SLIS.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID AND SLIS.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND
SL.TEST_FORM IS NULL
SL.TEST_FORM like #testForm:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.TEST_LEVEL IS NULL
#testLevel:VARCHAR# like '%' || SL.TEST_LEVEL || '%'
AND
SL.GRADE IS NULL
SL.GRADE = #grade:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.CONTENT_AREA IS NULL
SL.CONTENT_AREA like '%' || #contentArea:VARCHAR# || '%'
AND
SL.NORM_GROUP IS NULL
SL.NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#
AND
SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL
(SL.AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR# OR SL.AGE_CATEGORY IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as sourceScoreTypeCode, SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID as scoreLookupId, SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE as destScoreTypeCode, SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE as sourceScoreValue, SL.DEST_SCORE_VALUE as destScoreValue, SL.TEST_FORM as testForm, SL.TEST_LEVEL as testLevel, SL.GRADE as grade, SL.CONTENT_AREA as contentArea, SL.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, SL.NORM_YEAR as normYear, SL.AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, SL.EXTENDED_FLAG as extendedFlag FROM SCORE_LOOKUP SL, SCORE_LOOKUP_ITEM_SET SLIS WHERE SL.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID = SLIS.SCORE_LOOKUP_ID AND SLIS.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #sourceScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.DEST_SCORE_TYPE_CODE = #destScoreTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND SL.SOURCE_SCORE_VALUE = #sourceScoreValue:NUMERIC# AND

#testLevel:VARCHAR# like '%' || SL.TEST_LEVEL || '%'

SL.CONTENT_AREA like '%' || #contentArea:VARCHAR# || '%'
